headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: Request ID that supports idempotency to prevent you from sending the same request twice. If you retry requests with the same request ID multiple times within the 10-second cache time, then only one request will succeed. If a duplicate request with the expired request ID is received after the cache time, the server will treat it as a new request and process it accordingly. The ID is different from the request_id returned in the response parameters, which is used to uniquely identify an HTTP request. The value should be a string representation of a 64-bit integer. Example: "123456789" .

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok Shop. To obtain a TikTok Shop that is available for GMV Max Campaigns, use /gmv_max/store/list/ and confirm that the returned is_gmv_max_available is true .

parameters.name: store_authorized_bc_id
parameters.description: ID of the Business Center that is authorized to access the TikTok Shop ( store_id ).

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID. To ensure that the ad account has exclusive GMV Max authorization for the TikTok Shop that you want to promote, call /gmv_max/store/list/ and confirm that the returned advertiser_id within exclusive_authorized_advertiser_info is the same as the ad account that you want to use to create GMV Max Campaigns. If the returned advertiser_id is not the same as the ad account that you want to use to create GMV Max Campaigns, use /gmv_max/exclusive_authorization/create/ to grant the ad account exclusive GMV Max authorization for the TikTok Shop.

parameters.name: shopping_ads_type
parameters.description: The type of the GMV Max Campaign. Enum values: PRODUCT : Product GMV Max Campaign. LIVE : Live GMV Max Campaign. To learn about how to create such campaigns, see Create Product GMV Max Campaigns and Create LIVE GMV Max Campaigns .

parameters.name: product_specific_type
parameters.description: Valid only when shopping_ads_type is PRODUCT . Different dimensions to choose products. Enum values: ALL : Allow TikTok to dynamically choose from all products within the TikTok Shop. CUSTOMIZED_PRODUCTS : Specify a customized number of products within the TikTok Shop. To confirm whether you can promote all products in the TikTok Shop, call /gmv_max/store/shop_ad_usage_check/ and check the returned promote_all_products_allowed .

parameters.name: item_group_ids Conditional
parameters.description: Required when shopping_ads_type is PRODUCT and product_specific_type is CUSTOMIZED_PRODUCTS . Product SPU (standard product unit) IDs. Max size: 50. To obtain the list of SPU IDs for products within a TikTok Shop, use /store/product/get/ . Set ad_creation_eligible to GMV_MAX and select item_group_id values where status is AVAILABLE and gmv_max_ads_status is UNOCCUPIED .

parameters.name: optimization_goal
parameters.description: Optimization goal. Enum value: VALUE : Gross revenue.

parameters.name: deep_bid_type
parameters.description: Bid strategy. Enum value: VO_MIN_ROAS : Minimum ROAS. Bid with an ROI target.

parameters.name: roas_bid Conditional
parameters.description: Required only when deep_bid_type is VO_MIN_ROAS . ROI target. To obtain the recommended ROI target, use /gmv_max/bid/recommend/ and check the returned roas_bid .

parameters.name: budget
parameters.description: Daily budget. To obtain the recommended budget, use /gmv_max/bid/recommend/ and check the returned budget .

parameters.name: promotion_days
parameters.description: The promotion days setting details. Note : Enabling automatic budget increase for GMV Max Campaigns is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative. Once you are allowlisted, you can also configure promotion days settings for your GMV Max Campaigns. Once you are allowlisted for automatic budget increase: For new campaigns : Promotion days will follow automatic budget increase logic. See the description of auto_budget_enabled for details. Budgets can increase by up to 50% each time, with a maximum of 10 increases per day . Increases are triggered only when ROI achievement ≥ 90% and budget utilization ≥ 80%. For existing campaigns : Campaigns created before September 5, 2025 (without automatic budget increase) will default to a one-time 50% increase, applied only when the ROI target is achieved. However, if automatic budget increase is turned on later, the budget increases will revert to the new logic of increasing by up to 50% each time, with a maximum of 10 increases per day .

parameters.name: is_enabled
parameters.description: Whether to enable promotion days to automatically optimize your campaign for higher GMV during high-intent shopping dates in regions where your ads are delivering. Supported values: true , false . Default value: false . When promotion_days is specified, this field will be automatically set to true .

parameters.name: auto_schedule_enabled
parameters.description: Valid only when is_enabled is true . Whether to use TikTok Shop promotion days schedule. Supported values: true , false . When is_enabled is true , this field will be automatically set to true .

parameters.name: custom_schedule_list Conditional
parameters.description: Details of the custom promotion day schedules. If auto_schedule_enabled is false , specify at least one set of start_date and end_date in custom_schedule_list . If auto_schedule_enabled is true , custom_schedule_list is optional. Max size: 50.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of the custom promotion day schedule, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD (ad account time zone). Note : The start date cannot be after the end_date . The start date cannot be earlier than the current date. The start date must be on the same day as or after the schedule_start_time of the campaign. The custom promotion days schedule will automatically start at 00:00:00 of the start date in the ad account time zone.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the custom promotion day schedule, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD (ad account time zone) . Note : The end date cannot be earlier than the current time. The custom promotion days schedule will automatically end at 00:00:00 of the end date in the ad account time zone.

parameters.name: roas_bid_multiplier
parameters.description: The target ROI index. Changes to your target ROI will be in effect during promotion days and may drive higher GMV for this campaign. Enum values: 90 : -10%. To decrease your target ROI by 10% during promotion days. 80 : -20%. To decrease your target ROI by 20% during promotion days. 70 : -30%. To decrease your target ROI by 30% during promotion days. Default value: 90 .

parameters.name: auto_budget_enabled
parameters.description: Whether to enable automatic budget increase. When your achieved ROI reaches at least 90% of the target and 80% or more of your budget has been used, your daily campaign budget may automatically increase by up to 10 times to capture more sales. Your budget will reset to its original amount each day. When is_enabled within the object promotion_days is true and auto_budget_enabled is false , your ROI target will decrease and your daily budget will automatically increase during TikTok Shop promotion days (when auto_schedule_enabled is true ) and custom promotion days as defined by custom_schedule_list . Your daily budget will reset to its original amount every day. During standard days, your ROI target and budget won't change. When is_enabled within the object promotion_days is true and auto_budget_enabled is true , auto budget increase will be turned on during TikTok Shop promotion days (when auto_schedule_enabled is true ), custom promotion days as defined by custom_schedule_list ,** and standard days**. Your daily budget will reset to its original amount every day. During TikTok Shop promotion days and custom promotion days as defined by custom_schedule_list , your ROI target will decrease. During standard days, your ROI target won't change. When is_enabled within the object promotion_days is false and auto_budget_enabled is true , your ROI won't change, your daily campaign budget may automatically increase up to 10 times to optimize gross revenue. Your daily budget will reset to its original amount every day. Supported values: true , false . Default value: false . Note : Automatic budget increase for GMV Max Campaigns is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative.

parameters.name: schedule_type
parameters.description: Schedule type. Enum values: SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW : To run the campaign continuously after the scheduled start time. SCHEDULE_START_END : To run the campaign between the scheduled start time and end time.

parameters.name: schedule_start_time
parameters.description: Campaign delivery start time, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). The start time can be up to 12 hours earlier than the current time, but cannot be later than 2028-01-01 00:00:00 .

parameters.name: schedule_end_time Conditional
parameters.description: Required when schedule_type is SCHEDULE_START_END . Not supported when schedule_type is SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW . Campaign delivery end time, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). The end time cannot be later than 2038-01-01 00:00:00 .

parameters.name: product_video_specific_type Conditional
parameters.description: Required when shopping_ads_type is PRODUCT . The video selection mode. Enum values: AUTO_SELECTION : To autoselect videos. You need to specify identity_list simultaneously. CUSTOM_SELECTION : To manually select videos. You need to specify item_list simultaneously.

parameters.name: identity_list Conditional
parameters.description: Required when shopping_ads_type is LIVE . Optional when shopping_ads_type is PRODUCT and product_video_specific_type is AUTO_SELECTION . The list of identities (TikTok accounts) to associate with the GMV Max Campaign. When shopping_ads_type is PRODUCT and product_video_specific_type is AUTO_SELECTION , specify 0-20 identities as the source of video creatives via this field. To obtain a list of identities available for a Product GMV Max Campaign using the same TikTok Shop, use /gmv_max/identity/get/ and select identities with product_gmv_max_available as true . When no identities are specified through identity_list , the product images will be used as ad creatives. When shopping_ads_type is LIVE , specify one identity as the LIVE source via this field. To obtain an identity that is available for LIVE GMV Max Campaigns, call /gmv_max/identity/get/ and select identities with live_gmv_max_available as true .

parameters.name: identity_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when identity_list is passed. Identity ID.

parameters.name: identity_type Conditional
parameters.description: Required when identity_list is passed. Identity type. Enum values: AUTH_CODE : Authorized User. This type of identity is created when you use the authorization code to access a TikTok account or a TikTok post. TT_USER : TikTok User. This type of identity is created when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your TikTok Business Account, or when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your regular TikTok account and then upgrade the account to Business Account. BC_AUTH_TT : TikTok Account User in Business Center. This type of identity is created when you add a TikTok account to your Business Center, and the TikTok account owner approves your request. TTS_TT : TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop. This type of identity is created when you set an official TikTok account for the TikTok Shop.

parameters.name: identity_authorized_bc_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT . The ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

parameters.name: identity_authorized_shop_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required only when dentity_type is BC_AUTH_TT and identity_authorized_shop_id is returned for the identity from /gmv_max/identity/get/ . The ID of the TikTok Shop that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

parameters.name: store_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when identity_type is TTS_TT . The ID of the TikTok Shop that a TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop identity is associated with.

parameters.name: affiliate_posts_enabled
parameters.description: This field is valid and defaults to true when the following conditions are both met: shopping_ads_type is PRODUCT product_video_specific_type is AUTO_SELECTION Whether to enable affiliate posts for your Product GMV Max Campaign. Affiliate posts are TikTok posts created by affiliates (creators participating in the TikTok Shop Affiliate Program) and authorized for use in TikTok Shop Ads. Learn more about affiliate creatives for TikTok Shop Ads . Supported values: true , false .

parameters.name: item_list Conditional
parameters.description: Required when shopping_ads_type is PRODUCT and product_video_specific_type is CUSTOM_SELECTION . The list of authorized TikTok posts or customized TikTok posts to associate with the Product GMV Max campaign. Authorized TikTok posts are existing posts featuring your selected products from your TikTok accounts or authorized using video codes. If you want to manually select authorized TikTok posts only for the Product GMV Max campaign, include their details using item_list and do not specify custom_anchor_video_list . Customized TikTok posts are newly created posts for the campaign, built by adding customized product links to your selected videos. These posts will be exclusive to this Product GMV Max campaign. If you want to manually select customized TikTok posts for the Product GMV Max campaign, include details of the videos to be used in customized posts using item_list and specify custom_anchor_video_list simultaneously. Max size: 50. To obtain a list of TikTok posts available for a Product GMV Max Campaign using the same TikTok Shop, use /gmv_max/video/get/ .

parameters.name: item_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when item_list is passed. The ID of the TikTok post.

parameters.name: spu_id_list Conditional
parameters.description: Required when item_list is passed. Product SPU IDs associated or to associate with the TikTok post.

parameters.name: identity_info Conditional
parameters.description: Required when item_list is passed. Information about the identity associated or to associate with the TikTok post.

parameters.name: identity_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when item_list is passed. Identity ID.

parameters.name: identity_type Conditional
parameters.description: Required when item_list is passed. Identity type. Enum values: AUTH_CODE : Authorized User. This type of identity is created when you use the authorization code to access a TikTok account or a TikTok post. TT_USER : TikTok User. This type of identity is created when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your TikTok Business Account, or when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your regular TikTok account and then upgrade the account to Business Account. BC_AUTH_TT : TikTok Account User in Business Center. This type of identity is created when you add a TikTok account to your Business Center, and the TikTok account owner approves your request. TTS_TT : TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop. This type of identity is created when you set an official TikTok account for the TikTok Shop.

parameters.name: identity_authorized_bc_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT . The ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

parameters.name: identity_authorized_shop_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required only when dentity_type is BC_AUTH_TT and identity_authorized_shop_id is returned for the identity from /gmv_max/identity/get/ . The ID of the TikTok Shop that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

parameters.name: store_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when identity_type is TTS_TT . The ID of the TikTok Shop that a TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop identity is associated with.

parameters.name: video_info Conditional
parameters.description: Required when item_list is passed. Details of the video in the post.

parameters.name: video_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when item_list is passed. The ID of the video.

parameters.name: custom_anchor_video_list
parameters.description: The list of customized TikTok posts to associate with the Product GMV Max campaign. Customized TikTok posts are posts created during campaign setup by adding customized product links for your products ( spu_id_list within custom_anchor_video_list ) to specified videos ( item_id within custom_anchor_video_list ). These posts will be exclusive to this Product GMV Max campaign. For manual selection: When shopping_ads_type is PRODUCT and product_video_specific_type is CUSTOM_SELECTION , specify the videos to be used in customized posts using this field. For auto selection: When shopping_ads_type is PRODUCT and product_video_specific_type is AUTO_SELECTION , specify the videos to be auto-selected for customized posts using this field. Max size: 200. Note : Although you can add a maximum number of 200 customized posts during campaign creation, one Product GMV Max campaign can eventually include up to 2,000 customized posts. If you want to specify more than 200 customized posts for a Product GMV Max Campaign, you can update the custom_anchor_video_list of the campaign incrementally using /campaign/gmv_max/update/ , with updates limited to 200 additional posts per request.

parameters.name: item_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when custom_anchor_video_list is passed. The ID of a TikTok video to be used in a customized post. To retrieve eligible videos, use /gmv_max/video/get/ with custom_posts_eligible set to true.

parameters.name: spu_id_list Conditional
parameters.description: Required when custom_anchor_video_list is passed. The SPU IDs of the products to associate with the customized product anchor link in the TikTok post. Max size: 1.

parameters.name: identity_info Conditional
parameters.description: Required when custom_anchor_video_list is passed. Information about the identity to associate with the post.

parameters.name: identity_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when custom_anchor_video_list is passed. Identity ID. To obtain a list of identities available for GMV Max Campaigns, use /gmv_max/identity/get/ .

parameters.name: identity_type Conditional
parameters.description: Required when custom_anchor_video_list is passed. Identity type. Enum values: AUTH_CODE : Authorized User. This type of identity is created when you use the authorization code to access a TikTok account or a TikTok post. TT_USER : TikTok User. This type of identity is created when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your TikTok Business Account, or when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your regular TikTok account and then upgrade the account to Business Account. BC_AUTH_TT : TikTok Account User in Business Center. This type of identity is created when you add a TikTok account to your Business Center, and the TikTok account owner approves your request. TTS_TT : TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop. This type of identity is created when you set an official TikTok account for the TikTok Shop.

parameters.name: identity_authorized_bc_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT . The ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

parameters.name: identity_authorized_shop_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required only when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT and identity_authorized_shop_id is returned for the identity from /gmv_max/identity/get/ . The ID of the TikTok Shop that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

parameters.name: store_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when identity_type is TTS_TT . The ID of the TikTok Shop that a TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop identity is associated with.

parameters.name: campaign_name
parameters.description: The name of the GMV Max Campaign.

examples.title: Create a Product GMV Max Campaign
Create a LIVE GMV Max Campaign

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: advertiser_id
fields.description: Advertiser ID.

fields.name: operation_status
fields.description: The status of the GMV Max Campaign. Enum values: DISABLE : Disabled. ENABLE : Enabled.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: The ID of the GMV Max Campaign.

fields.name: campaign_name
fields.description: The name of the GMV Max Campaign.

fields.name: store_id
fields.description: The ID of the TikTok Shop.

fields.name: store_authorized_bc_id
fields.description: ID of the Business Center that is authorized to access the TikTok Shop ( store_id ).

fields.name: shopping_ads_type
fields.description: The type of the GMV Max Campaign. Enum values: PRODUCT : Product GMV Max Campaign. LIVE : Live GMV Max Campaign.

fields.name: product_specific_type
fields.description: Different dimensions to choose products. Enum values: ALL : Allow TikTok to dynamically choose from all products within the TikTok Shop. CUSTOMIZED_PRODUCTS : Specify a customized number of products within the TikTok Shop. UNSET : Unset.

fields.name: item_group_ids
fields.description: Returned only when shopping_ads_type is PRODUCT and product_specific_type is CUSTOMIZED_PRODUCTS . Product SPU (standard product unit) IDs.

fields.name: optimization_goal
fields.description: Optimization goal. Enum value: VALUE : Gross revenue.

fields.name: roi_protection_enabled
fields.description: Whether the campaign is eligible for ROI protection. ROI protection is a feature that automatically issues ad credits when the return on investment (ROI) for your campaign falls below a certain threshold despite following GMV Max guidelines and best practices. To learn about the eligibility criteria for ROI protection and scenarios where the campaign is ineligible for ROI protection, see About ROI protection for GMV Max campaigns . Supported values: true , false .

fields.name: deep_bid_type
fields.description: Bid strategy. Enum value: VO_MIN_ROAS : Minimum ROAS. Bid with an ROI target.

fields.name: roas_bid
fields.description: Returned only when deep_bid_type is VO_MIN_ROAS . ROI target.

fields.name: budget
fields.description: Daily budget.

fields.name: promotion_days
fields.description: The promotion days setting details.

fields.name: is_enabled
fields.description: Whether to enable promotion days to automatically optimize your campaign for higher GMV during high-intent shopping dates in regions where your ads are delivering. When promotion days are active for this campaign, your ad credits will be calculated for your promotion days target ROI setting. Supported values: true , false .

fields.name: auto_schedule_enabled
fields.description: Whether to use TikTok Shop promotion days schedule. Supported values: true , false .

fields.name: custom_schedule_list
fields.description: Details of the custom promotion day schedules.

fields.name: start_time
fields.description: The start time of the custom promotion day schedule, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD (ad account time zone).

fields.name: end_time
fields.description: The end time of the custom promotion day schedule, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD (ad account time zone).

fields.name: roas_bid_multiplier
fields.description: The target ROI index. Changes to your target ROI will be in effect during promotion days and may drive higher GMV for this campaign. Enum values: 90 : -10%. To decrease your target ROI by 10% during promotion days. 80 : -20%. To decrease your target ROI by 20% during promotion days. 70 : -30%. To decrease your target ROI by 30% during promotion days.

fields.name: adjusted_roas_bid
fields.description: Promotion days target ROI.

fields.name: current_budget
fields.description: The current campaign daily budget. If the budget does not undergo automatic increases, this value matches your specified daily budget ( budget ). In cases where automatic increases occur, this value will exceed your specified campaign daily budget.

fields.name: next_increase
fields.description: The increase in budget compared with your specified campaign daily budget ( budget ). For example, if budget is 300 USD and next_increase is 150 USD, then current_budget will be 450 USD, indicating a daily budget increase of 150 USD.

fields.name: maximum_budget
fields.description: The maximum potential increase in budget. Formula: maximum_budget = budget + next_increase x 10. For instance, if budget is 200 USD and next_increase is 100 USD, maximum_budget will be 1200 USD, as the increase can occur up to 10 times daily.

fields.name: estimated_gross_revenue_increase
fields.description: The estimated percentage increase in gross revenue due to the ROI change during promotion days. Example: 24% .

fields.name: auto_budget_enabled
fields.description: Whether to enable automatic budget increase. When your achieved ROI reaches at least 90% of the target and 80% or more of your budget has been used, your daily campaign budget may automatically increase by up to 10 times to capture more sales. Your budget will reset to its original amount each day. When is_enabled within the object promotion_days is true and auto_budget_enabled is false , your ROI target will decrease and your daily budget will automatically increase during TikTok Shop promotion days (when auto_schedule_enabled is true ) and custom promotion days as defined by custom_schedule_list . Your daily budget will reset to its original amount every day. During standard days, your ROI target and budget won't change. When is_enabled within the object promotion_days is true and auto_budget_enabled is true , auto budget increase will be turned on during TikTok Shop promotion days (when auto_schedule_enabled is true ), custom promotion days as defined by custom_schedule_list ,** and standard days**. Your daily budget will reset to its original amount every day. During TikTok Shop promotion days and custom promotion days as defined by custom_schedule_list , your ROI target will decrease. During standard days, your ROI target won't change. When is_enabled within the object promotion_days is false and auto_budget_enabled is true , your ROI won't change, your daily campaign budget may automatically increase up to 10 times to optimize gross revenue. Your daily budget will reset to its original amount every day. Supported values: true , false .

fields.name: schedule_type
fields.description: Schedule type. Enum values: SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW : To run the campaign continuously after the scheduled start time. SCHEDULE_START_END : To run the campaign between the scheduled start time and end time.

fields.name: schedule_start_time
fields.description: Campaign delivery start time, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0).

fields.name: schedule_end_time
fields.description: Campaign delivery end time, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0).

fields.name: placements
fields.description: Placements. The apps where you want to deliver your campaign. Enum values: PLACEMENT_TIKTOK : TikTok. PLACEMENT_PANGLE : Pangle. Note : Product GMV Max Campaigns automatically explore and choose from the most extensive audience scope across TikTok and Pangle. Learn more about Pangle . If you want to opt out of the Pangle placement for your Product GMV Max Campaigns, contact your TikTok representative.

fields.name: location_ids
fields.description: The IDs of the targeted locations. To learn about the corresponding location for a location ID, see Location IDs .

fields.name: age_groups
fields.description: The targeted age groups. For enum values, see Enumeration - Age Group .

fields.name: product_video_specific_type
fields.description: The video selection mode. Enum values: AUTO_SELECTION : To autoselect videos. CUSTOM_SELECTION : To manually select videos. UNSET : Unset.

fields.name: identity_list
fields.description: The list of identities (TikTok accounts) associated with the GMV Max Campaign.

fields.name: identity_id
fields.description: Identity ID.

fields.name: identity_type
fields.description: Identity type. Enum values: AUTH_CODE : Authorized User. This type of identity is created when you use the authorization code to access a TikTok account or a TikTok post. TT_USER : TikTok User. This type of identity is created when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your TikTok Business Account, or when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your regular TikTok account and then upgrade the account to Business Account. BC_AUTH_TT : TikTok Account User in Business Center. This type of identity is created when you add a TikTok account to your Business Center, and the TikTok account owner approves your request. TTS_TT : TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop. This type of identity is created when you set an official TikTok account for the TikTok Shop.

fields.name: identity_authorized_bc_id
fields.description: Returned only when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT . The ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

fields.name: identity_authorized_shop_id
fields.description: Returned for some BC_AUTH_TT identities. The ID of the TikTok Shop that the TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

fields.name: store_id
fields.description: Returned only when identity_type is TTS_TT . The ID of the TikTok Shop that a TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop identity is associated with.

fields.name: affiliate_posts_enabled
fields.description: Whether to enable affiliate posts for your Product GMV Max Campaign. Affiliate posts are TikTok posts created by affiliates (creators participating in the TikTok Shop Affiliate Program) and authorized for use in TikTok Shop Ads. Learn more about affiliate creatives for TikTok Shop Ads . Supported values: true , false .

fields.name: item_list
fields.description: The list of authorized TikTok posts associated with the GMV Max campaign. Authorized TikTok posts are existing posts featuring your selected products from your TikTok accounts or authorized using video codes.

fields.name: item_id
fields.description: The ID of the TikTok post.

fields.name: text
fields.description: The caption of the TikTok post.

fields.name: spu_id_list
fields.description: The list of Product SPU IDs that the TikTok post is associated with.

fields.name: identity_info
fields.description: Information about the identity associated with the TikTok post.

fields.name: identity_id
fields.description: Identity ID.

fields.name: identity_type
fields.description: Identity type. Enum values: AUTH_CODE : Authorized User. This type of identity is created when you use the authorization code to access a TikTok account or a TikTok post. TT_USER : TikTok User. This type of identity is created when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your TikTok Business Account, or when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your regular TikTok account and then upgrade the account to Business Account. BC_AUTH_TT : TikTok Account User in Business Center. This type of identity is created when you add a TikTok account to your Business Center, and the TikTok account owner approves your request. TTS_TT : TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop. This type of identity is created when you set an official TikTok account for the TikTok Shop.

fields.name: identity_authorized_bc_id
fields.description: Returned only when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT . The ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

fields.name: identity_authorized_shop_id
fields.description: Returned for some BC_AUTH_TT identities. The ID of the TikTok Shop that the TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

fields.name: store_id
fields.description: Returned only when identity_type is TTS_TT . The ID of the TikTok Shop that a TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop identity is associated with.

fields.name: profile_image
fields.description: Temporary profile image URL for the TikTok account that is associated with the identity. Validity period: around 48 hours. The expiration time is included in the URL after the x-expires parameter, in the format of an Epoch/Unix timestamp in seconds. Once the URL expires, you need to call /campaign/gmv_max/info/ to obtain a new URL.

fields.name: user_name
fields.description: The username of the TikTok account that is associated with the identity.

fields.name: video_info
fields.description: Details of the video in the post.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: The ID of the video.

fields.name: video_cover_url
fields.description: Temporary URL for the video cover. Validity period: around 24 hours. The expiration time is included in the URL after the x-expires parameter, in the format of an Epoch/Unix timestamp in seconds. Once the URL expires, you need to call /campaign/gmv_max/info/ to obtain a new URL.

fields.name: preview_url
fields.description: Temporary preview URL for the video. Validity period: six hours. Once the URL expires, you need to call /campaign/gmv_max/info/ to obtain a new URL.

fields.name: height
fields.description: The height of the video in pixels. Example: 1920.

fields.name: width
fields.description: The width of the video in pixels. Example: 1080.

fields.name: bit_rate
fields.description: The bit rate of the video in bps. Example: 8500323.

fields.name: duration
fields.description: The duration of the video in seconds. Example: 3.669.

fields.name: size
fields.description: The size of the video in bytes. Example: 3898461.

fields.name: signature
fields.description: The MD5 of the video. Example: ab1cd2345e678fghi91jkl23b456m7no .

fields.name: format
fields.description: The format of the video. Example: mp4 .

fields.name: definition
fields.description: The definition of the video. Example: 1080p .

fields.name: fps
fields.description: The frames per second (FPS) of the video. Example: 27.

fields.name: campaign_custom_anchor_video_id
fields.description: The ID of the collection of customized posts created in the Product GMV Max Campaign. You can pass this field to /gmv_max/custom_anchor_video_list/get/ to obtain the details of the customized posts within the collection.

fields.name: custom_anchor_video_list
fields.description: The list of customized TikTok posts associated with the GMV Max campaign. Customized TikTok posts are posts with custom product links.

fields.name: item_id
fields.description: The ID of the TikTok post.

fields.name: spu_id_list
fields.description: The list of Product SPU IDs that the TikTok post is associated with.

fields.name: identity_info
fields.description: Information about the identity associated with the TikTok post.

fields.name: identity_id
fields.description: Identity ID.

fields.name: identity_type
fields.description: Identity type. Enum values: AUTH_CODE : Authorized User. This type of identity is created when you use the authorization code to access a TikTok account or a TikTok post. TT_USER : TikTok User. This type of identity is created when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your TikTok Business Account, or when you bind your TikTok For Business account with your regular TikTok account and then upgrade the account to Business Account. BC_AUTH_TT : TikTok Account User in Business Center. This type of identity is created when you add a TikTok account to your Business Center, and the TikTok account owner approves your request. TTS_TT : TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop. This type of identity is created when you set an official TikTok account for the TikTok Shop.

fields.name: identity_authorized_bc_id
fields.description: Returned only when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT . The ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

fields.name: identity_authorized_shop_id
fields.description: Returned for some BC_AUTH_TT identities. The ID of the TikTok Shop that the TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with.

fields.name: store_id
fields.description: Returned only when identity_type is TTS_TT . The ID of the TikTok Shop that a TikTok Account User for TikTok Shop identity is associated with.
